ModMetaData.name: ED-VisibleRadius
ModMetaData.author: Jaxxa
ModMetaData.description: Requires: ED-Core Adds the option to keep the special display radius visable when some buildings are not selected. Currently supports Trade Beacons and Sun Lamps. By default it will be on a timer to turn off after about 40 seconds, can be switched to perminantly on or off.
